categoryDescription.title: Isoart Partition and Ceiling Panels offer thermoacoustic insulation, lightness and versatility for internal environments.
categoryDescription.description: Isoart Partition and Ceiling Panels are ideal for creating internal partitions and thermoacoustic ceilings in commercial, industrial and residential projects. With expanded polystyrene (EPS) or polyisocyanurate (PIR) core and galvalume steel coating, they provide excellent thermal and acoustic insulation, as well as easy installation and aesthetic finish. They are perfect for offices, warehouses and spaces that require environmental comfort and speed of execution.

applications.title: Thermoacoustic solutions for partitions and ceilings in diverse environments
applications.description: Isoart Partition and Ceiling Panels are ideal for projects that require internal partitions and ceilings with high thermoacoustic performance. Manufactured with EPS or PIR core, they offer fast assembly, noise reduction and thermal comfort, being perfect for offices, auditoriums and industrial warehouses.

tabDescriptions.Thermoacoustic insulation: With PIR core (density from 30 to 38 kg/mÂ³), the panels provide noise reduction (22 to 30 dB) and thermal insulation (conductivity 0.022 W/m.K), ideal for environments that require acoustic and thermal comfort, such as offices and auditoriums.
tabDescriptions.Efficient assembly: The modular system with male-female interlocking allows fast and clean installation, reducing labor and equipment costs. The lightness of the panels facilitates transport and logistics at the construction site.
tabDescriptions.Aesthetic customization: Available in smooth, ribbed or micro-ribbed finishes, with pre-painted galvalume steel coating (white RAL 9003 or other colors upon request), the panels adapt to different architectural needs, ensuring a modern look.
tabDescriptions.Sustainability and durability: Resistant to corrosion, Isoart panels guarantee long service life with minimal maintenance. The use of pentane as an expansion agent in PIR ensures environmental compliance, without HCFC emissions, meeting the Montreal Protocol.
